title: Cori Lopazanski
text:
Ocean enthusiast turned fish ecologist (& environmental data scientist)
I am an applied marine ecologist who uses field experiments, monitoring studies, and quantitative synthesis to evaluate and inform conservation and management
PhD UCSB Bren School
BS UNC Chapel Hill
